title: Samsung and LG may decide whether Apple releases a foldable iPhone in 2018
text:
Samsung and LG may decide whether Apple releases a foldable iPhone in 2018 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
A new report from Korea says LG and Samsung are close to perfecting a foldable smartphone, and that Apple is eyeing the project with a view ...
